title: Fleetwood Mac - 1974-10-08 - Ultrasonic Studios, Hempstead, NY
description:
Here is another vintage bootleg. Check my account for more classic bootlegs.

Please enjoy, share with friends and please seed :)


Fleetwood Mac
Ultrasonic Studios 
Hempstead, NY, USA
October 8, 1974
FM Broadcast

Goody Speed/Pitch-adjusted Remaster

Source:
'Hypnotized' CD > ? > Long flac file > Audacity for split > You 

Goody's additional lineage:
foobar2000 (WAV) > Audition (Adjust DC Bias; Pitch Bender - various amounts; Gaps removed; Tracking adjusted; New track splits created; transitions smoothed) > TLH (FLAC Level 8; Align sector boundaries; .ffp) > foobar2000 (tags)


01 The Green Manalishi (With the Two-Pronged Crown) 5:36
02 Spare Me A Little Of Your Love 4:02
03 Sentimental Lady 3:06 >
04 Future Games 6:07
05 Bermuda Triangle 9:28
06 Band Intros, Talk & Tuning 2:35
07 Why 4:20
08 Angel 5:40
09 Homeward Bound 4:37
10 Tuning The Rattle 0:50 >
11 Rattlesnake Shake 10:25
12 Hypnotized 6:43
13 Black Magic Woman 7:44 >
14 Mystery To Me 3:24

Total time: 74:45


Bob Welch - guitar, vocals
Christine McVie - keyboards, vocals
John McVie - bass
Mick Fleetwood - drums
Doug Graves - organ, synthesizer [previously incorrectly listed as Bob Hunt]


frogster's original notes:
This is one of the last shows before Buckingham and Nicks joined the band and changed the sound and direction of Fleetwood Mac once again. 
So many personnel changes over the years had given the band an ever-evolving sound that seemed to subtly change with each new album.
This incarnation was on tour to promote their then new LP, "Heroes Are Hard to Find".
They found themselves in the bizarre position of having to declare themselves "The Real Fleetwood Mac".
Thousands of people had been duped into paying money to see what they thought was the "real" band. Thankfully, this didn't last long!
Enjoy the sounds of what was, for a brief moment - the real "Fleetwood Mac"!

shntool text detailing CD rip and subsequent fix included
